subdisciplines.name: Documentary theories
subdisciplines.description: the study of theoretical frameworks within which documentaries are conceptualized and analyzed.

subdisciplines.name: Documentary production
subdisciplines.description: the study of the techniques, processes, and technologies used in producing documentaries.

subdisciplines.name: Documentary criticism
subdisciplines.description: the study of critical approaches to analyzing documentaries, including formalist, Marxist, feminist, and psychoanalytic readings.
